name: Infinitesimalia
description:
~ The World's Much Prettier From Afar ~

Developed over the course of 1 week minus a hurricane for the Fermi Paradox Jam

Arrows to move

Escape to Quit

Music: Illuminations by Lee Rosevere, Atarxia by Lee Rosevere

This is my second finished game, so any and all feedback would be very welcome.

: )
